website_summaries.verdict: This popular nap mat is cozy, comfortable, and comes with everything you need for nap time in a single, easy-to-transport package.
pros: Soft materials and fleece-lined blanket keep little ones cozy
Rolls up and fastens with a Velcro strap, making it ideal for on-the-go use
Available in a wide variety of fun colors and prints
cons: Colors have a tendency to fade after a few washes

customer_reviews.title: Face Rash from the material
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on this mat my son's face broke out in a rash. I’m not sure if it’s because of a chemical used on the product or because the material is SO ROUGH. Either way...no thanks! It is adorable, but sadly I will be returning this and looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shark nap mat and received it yesterday. In the past I have bought the mats directly from Wildkins website and have never been disappointed. Today I am COMPLETELY disappointed. After receiving it yesterday I immediately washed it in cold water and laid it out to dry. The material is very rough and the blanket wrinkled. How is a nap mat that I bought yesterday after one wash look like this? How is it suppose to last an entire year? I am extremely unsatisfied and want a refund. Not worth the money. Plan to buy directly from Wildkins.
customer_reviews.author: ccal1234567

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo excited to see this cute print for my baby boy. It just came in today and I put it in the wash. When it came out, it is completely covered in fabric pills and the colors have faded & bleed everywhere. I am so disappointed. Especially for the amount I paid. I bough my girl one and it lasted until she was 5. Baby just turned one. I am highly disappointed. I am the director of a child care center and will be telling all our parents about my experience.
customer_reviews.author: April Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the reviews and for the first time I am extremely disappointed. I am not sure whose child fits comfortably on this mat but my 2 and half year old barely fit. He is average in size so the description is wrong. I asked my daycare the dimensions of the mats they use and this is very small in comparison. What added to the extreme disappointment was that I was responsible to pay for the return shipping. I have never had a bad experience on Amazon and this purchase sure changed that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your money and by a memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in this purchase for the price of this product I was expecting something better and did not it is just one of those cheap kinder mat with material over it. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this purchase. I ordered this mat a little over a month ago and used it for nap time at school. I've been washing it once a week and followed the care instructions on the label. The quality is really poor and the fabric already looks faded and old. I definitely expected a better product for this price range. I like the design and the features of the mat but the fabric quality is terrible! It's been over 30days now since we ordered and now I can't return it :(
customer_reviews.author: studentM

customer_reviews.title: Okay for daycares and smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: Makes daycare naps fun... However wish the blanket portion was way larger and it was a bit longer for the taller toddlers. Wouldn't buy again unless they made a much longer version... Quality has significantly deriorated over rhe past few months... Collected significant amounts of dust and lint... Would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions for care to clean the mat before allowing my son to sleep on it. After washing it, the mat is faded & looks old! The nap mat is thick enough to give my son a comfortable place to lay for his nap but the fabric is obviously of poor quality & it's NOT WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. It has a strap so my son can carry it at preschool, and Velcro straps to roll it back up again. I chose this nap mat because cheaper ones reportedly started unraveling when washed. The pillow is built in, like a sleeping bag so there is no worry of it coming off. Most importantly, this is COMFY! I had my son try it out when we got it, and if I were small enough I would have tried it out myself! I think I will probably scotchguard it on the bottom just to make sure it stays nice. With things like this, I usually wash on delicate to make sure the stuffing doesn’t get lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Camino

customer_reviews.title: Rough material. Could be softer
customer_reviews.text: I wish the material was softer. For example the pillow case is extremely rough. Wish it was softer like the interior of the blanket. Also you can’t put it in the dryer. Needs to be hung dry so that’s inconvenient especially when this is being used at daycare and needs to be washed frequently. And it does not hang dry quickly due to the thickness of the material.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The padding is horrible, its very thin. The pillow size is nice. If the entire mat was the pillow size than it would have been worth every penny. Don't waste your time or money. I would not even buy it for my pet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well for over a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat for my son to use at daycare over a year ago. He still uses it everyday and it has been fine. I wash it once a week and it has held up with no problems; fabric and stitching are strong and durable. It’s not as brightly colored as it once was but who cares. It’s not very thick, but it has a comfortable (removable) pillow and he sleeps in his clothes anyway. Per his daycare reports, he sleeps for 90-120 min per nap, so I would say this napmat is just fine for the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Holds up for years of rough treatment
customer_reviews.text: We bought this three years ago, right when our son was promoted from crib nap to mat nap. I felt like it was a bit pricey at the time but after washing it for the last time today (he starts a no nap room on Monday) I think it was absolutely worth it. It looks older but still very good and soft. It's been washed on hot and heavy and dried in the drier about once a week for three years. It's been sleep-nap-peed-on. It washes up nice and soft and is easy to tote back and forth from daycare. Son loves it still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really great napmat for my kid's preschool naps. The mat doesn't have a fancy cushion or filling but it's soft enough for my toddler to nap at school (the classroom is also carpeted). Rolled up, this mat fits in a standard Utility Storage Crate (10.5 inches (H) x 13.62 inches (W) x 15.5 inches (L)) if you jam the mat inside a little. I've had this mat for a year, machine washed it a dozen times, and still looks good (no pilling). If you want to roll the mat up really tight, the velco straps can't latch.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Aftwr reading reviews on several toddle sleep mats I decided to get this one. It is nice, looks well made and my son likes the pattern, and the blanket nice and soft on the inside. BUT..... There is very little padding, no more then a sleeping bag. You would Dedinatly need to purchase a separate sleep pad to use this on the floor or camping. It would be great to use on top of an air mattress. I am debating returning it and finding one with better padding
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice for Sleep Mat
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a sleep mat for preschool and this brand was highly recommended by some of the other parents. I was leery because of how thin it looked in the picture, but when it came in I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and thickness. My son also loves his sleep mat so much we had to buy a second one for the house. This is easy to clean in washing machine, just remove the pillow first and I tumble dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sloane Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great item to use at daycare
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Since school is out and summer vacay started, I had to get something for my son to use during nap time at daycare. Just like how its advertised. My son is absolutely in love with it. The colors are awesome and he personally wanted robots so this was a perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.author: XDIPNDOTSX

customer_reviews.title: Great Nap mat or even sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my child's kindergarten. They required a nap mat and I didn't want the standard blue and red plastic one. Wanted something he could use for other purpose once they stop resting at Kindergarten. This works great. He even used it in bed a few nights. The 'blanket' on top is not quite long enough to cover him completely but it works fine. He is 5 and able to roll it up by himself so it's easy. Not yet washed it but will see how it holds up after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, super cute, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my toddler for daycare and he absolutely loves it. It’s super comfortable and easy to clean and very durable. Have been using it for about 2 months now with regular weekly (sometimes more than that) cleanings. We just remove the pillow part and throw it in the wash. My child is always cold and has never complained once while using. Definitely a product that I would recommend to any parent.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Blank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect adorable nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Adorable nap mat. My 2.5 year old is 37 inches and fits perfectly and naps very well at daycare on this at. My child loves the zoo print and also loves that she can carry it in to school herself by the carry handle! For reference she uses it on a cot and it is plenty fluffy and comfy. It washes well when following the instructions. I remove the pillow, use delicate cycle wash, and low heat in the dryer and it comes out good as new. I would say that you may want something more substantial if your daycare doesn't provide a cot and nap time is on a hard cold floor.
customer_reviews.author: Walk2345

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality especially for a $40 mat
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mat in the mail the other day. I washed it on gentle cycle in our front loader and hung it to dry only once. My child hasn't even used it for school yet and the fabric is already worn looking and has small holes. Also the seams are really poor quality. This fabric would definitely not make it through a years worth of washes. Going to return it if I can or contact the company. Update: I filed a claim with Wildkin and they are sending a replacement mat. I will update the review once I receive the new mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for school since he was starting pre-k and needed it. Once it came I opened the package and it was all rolled up into an easy to carry bundle with a handle. I unrolled it and it came with a small pillow and the attached blanket. I did throw it in the wash on delicate, I made sure to take the pillow out of the case and wash it as well. It didn’t lose its shape after being washed and the material defenitely feels durable. I have already washed it a few times and it still looks great! My son absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G.

customer_reviews.title: Need to be hang dry. Good quality nap mat
customer_reviews.text: One of the rare times that I would recommend a product that I return. I was thoroughly impressed by the thickness and material for this nap mat but at the same time know that it won't work for us because it needs to be hang dry thus can't be laundered and dried on Sunday afternoon when we forget to clean it on Friday or Saturday. If
customer_reviews.author: MWC

customer_reviews.title: Mold!?!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: First time taking pillow out to wash it before use and it smells awful and has these black dots all over it (assuming mold??) disappointing as this is my third wildkin nap mat to purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price 👍
customer_reviews.text: The quality is worth what was paid for. The color doesn't fade after a wash. I would recommend using a fan or ceiling fan when air drying as it helped a lot for us since it is not recommended for dryer use. Their was fuzz in the inside but that is not preventable. Not as much fuzz as we thought though. I would say it is a bit smaller than expected. Just a little bit longer than my son who is 3 years old. Good thing is my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Minsu Park

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this nap mat for him last year, because the other roll up mats were too short for him. I cannot be more pleased with this mat. Due to health concerns, we now machine wash AND machine dry this mat 5 days a week, and it doesn't show any signs of failing. I don't want to jinx it, but my son has been using it for longer than I thought it would last, and I thought I'd write a good review. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: FADES TERRIBLY..otherwise soft and good concept. My two year old loves it. It’s just very ugly now.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the space design very soft my kid loves it but it fades TERRIBLY ... so bad that we will only use it for the daycare. I would be embarrassed to send it anywhere else. I wish I could exchange.. from reading reviews it seems that certain designs fade more than others.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Received Sleeping Bag, not Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 2 stars because this is not even close to what we received. We received really nice quality sleeping bags (bulky roll up with full zip) in the same dino print instead of the mats we ordered. I actually love them but they are too big/ bulky for preschool. The jungle print mat we ordered came as expected and it's perfect. I hate to only give 2 stars because they are actually pretty great but I'm annoyed I didn't get what was ordered...also they are so great we are keeping them and I will buy an additional mat.
customer_reviews.author: Fran M

customer_reviews.title: Faded after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this mat. My son seems to do well on it but after 1 wash it has completely faded in color and 2 spots the color is darker than the surrounding area. We are obviously stuck with this mat as we have washed it and used it but I would not recommend spending your money with this company. This may just be $40 to them but to me that is a lot of money for something that will not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Daycare perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for daycare! Two things I wish it had.. 1: A place for a name tag or somewhere where you can spot the owner of the bag. Especially important at daycare! 2: It wasn't such scratchy material, I'm positive my son doesn't care but personally everyone wants a soft blanket or at least a sheet material versus a muslin feeling material. Overall great product, came out the wash great , dries great rolls up great and it has Dinos!
customer_reviews.author: olivia carril

customer_reviews.title: OK but lacks padding
customer_reviews.text: Cute dino print and rolls up easily. However I have two issues with this mat. (1) the pillow is over stuffed and too poofy, can't imagine it being comfortable for my 18m old son. I cut open the pillow and took about half the filling out of it and now it's much better for a toddler neck and head (2) It could really use something like a thin foam padding built in, similar to a thin yoga mat. I thinking about cutting it open and sliding my unused yoga mat inside of it. I think it will work OK but would need to take to seamstress to sew it back up, since this needs to stay intact for daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous22

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable even for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: We use this sleeping bag for our early toddler-aged son at daycare. It comes home at the end of each week and has held up to multiple washings without any color fading, pilling, or other damage. The pillow portion stays filled and is so helpful because we don’t have to send a physical pillow in. The blanket portion allows him to control his comfort and not feel trapped (due to the fact that there are no zippers). This sleeping bag was a great bargain and very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for School / Daycare
customer_reviews.text: Had to purchase one of these for my son's school this year. So easy to roll up, not too big - but bigger than those fleece ones. I love in the desert, so the fleece one's seem a little too much blanked for our weather. I love the grey and white car design. No one else has it so he always knows it's his. Pillow comes out easily to wash. I dry on low for like 10 min and then air dry the rest of the night! 2 months in and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfAxel

customer_reviews.title: Nap mat for daycare
customer_reviews.text: First off I don’t understand why these mats are so expensive, also as other reviews state the material is a little scratchy and not soft. It says to wash on general cycle and hang dry??? Who has time for that with kids stuff! I have washed and dried regular and seems to be holding up fine. My son loves it and always asks for his “nap nap”
customer_reviews.author: forest42

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. We have been using this for my Toddler in his Day Care for his nap time and its very comfortable for him. It is definitely easy to clean. The only thing I wish better in this product is that the pillow is also machine washable. However the pillow is not machine washable. We have been removing the pillow and washing the mat and its great !! I would definitely recommend this product to other moms.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Adapa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect preschool napmat
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves his new nap mat. We bought it a few days before he started school so he could get used to it and on the days we bring the nap mat home to wash, he always reminds me that he needs to take his mat back to school. I was afraid the color would fade so I use the gentle cycle to tumble dry and hang dry the still damp mat. I don’t see fading yet. Be sure to remove the pillow before washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, soft nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: I got this nap mat for my 19 month old son to use at Mothers Day Out. It’s so soft and so easy to roll up! He naps great in it! It washes well but you cannot put in the dryer, I hang mine over a shower curtain rod and it drys overnight! I would definitely recommend this to anyone in need of a child’s sleep mat, it’s plenty long so my little one can grow into it and hopefully use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: KatieLynn

customer_reviews.title: Fabric fades easily!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat for my son's first year of preschool. It was very easy for him to carry into school, as parents are only able to drop off at the main entrance. I like the way that it rolls up! It was easy to wash, and the pillow is removable. My son returned home with his nap mat every two weeks for washing. The pattern is so cute, but the colors quickly faded on the mat which is disappointing. It fit nicely over his sleep cot, but I still sent in a fitted crib sheet for the cot. The nap mat laid nicely over top of the cot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute sleeping bag
customer_reviews.text: Very cute mat, seems to be high quality. Definitely falls into more of a ‘sleeping bag’ category not a mattress by any means. My kids really likes curling up in this and his preschool room has carpet so the lack of padding shouldn’t be a big problem. I do think for the price there should be an actual cushion insert.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy!
customer_reviews.text: After washing this mat weekly for about 6 months, the inside of the blanket is extremely scratchy and rough. Everything else about the mat is fine but I would have to rip out that fabric to make it usable. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to try this product because they claimed it was made with 100% cotton. It was NOT. It was a tiny piece of flannel that was made of cotton. This product pills like crazy and I did everything the washing instructions said to do. I only washed it twice!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this napmat! I am not going to say that it will make your toddler become a great napper (mine isn't), but it might at least keep them quiet at naptime. The pillow is removeable. I think the directions say to wash in a front-loader, but I have a top loader. After several months of weekly washing on gentle, I see no signs of wear. I lay mine out flat to dry on a drying rack under a fan and it's dry overnight.
customer_reviews.author: S. Minica

customer_reviews.title: Two years later and we are still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this nap mat for two years now (ages 2-3) and it has held up wonderfully. It gets washed and dried in a regular laundry cycle, but I try not to overdry it so that it will last longer. The pillow is removable for washing. My son loves it and hasn’t complained about it once. The pillow and blanket are a nice touch. He is tall for his age and seems to fit in it well. I will never purchase another brand if I can help it. This one has been very good to us.
customer_reviews.author: N Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly rough fabric
customer_reviews.text: After washing, the fabric on this is incredibly rough. I'm sure it will soften up after first use, but each new washing will equate to an uncomfortable initial nap for my kiddo. Would return, if we didn't need it for school TODAY.
customer_reviews.author: CHarrington

customer_reviews.title: Good design concept
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, didn't have any rips. It's nice how the pillow comes out of the attached pillow case. I also like how it's all one piece, makes taking this to school very easy. I took a star away because it shrunk a bit after washing. I washed on cold and dried on low, so took every precaution. We will still use it, I just hope my son doesn't want to lay flat or his feet will stick out!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality nap mat...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves his nap mat! We’ve had it for about six months now. The quality has held up through his roughness and dragging it around the house. It’s easy to roll up and velcro the tabs back together for storage. There is also a little pocket on the back that fits a name card in case it gets lost in the school or somewhere... We bought the matching backpack and lunch bag so when he goes to preschool next month it will be easy for him to distinguish which are his. We are new fans of Wildkin. Would recommend to anyone! Hope this review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Child sleeps well
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old uses this at daycare and it works very well. He loves it! He likes to lay on it at home when we bring it home to wash. I have washed it twice with no issues. The pillow comes out for washing. The mat is staying together very well. We do not use a foam mat under it. The mat is padded enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer Velcro straps are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good nap mat! It is soft, it Has held up for a year and a half with lots and lots of washing and wear! It has faded, but it is still going strong. What I especially love about this brand versus others, is that the Velcro straps are longer, holding a rolled nap together better than other brands. I will purchase this brand again without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Stewart C.

customer_reviews.title: Nap Mat does not match other items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a part of a matching set that included a lunch box and backpack. All three were supposed to match—that’s why I chose this product over others. When I got the order the nap mat is a much lighter blue than the backpack and lunch box. Same pattern, different blues. Don’t advertise as a matching set unless they match. And because I need to use it very quickly and don’t have time to get a replacement, I’m stuck with it. May not seem like a big deal, but just know the products don’t truly match.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Amox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pre-K/K naps!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son needed a blanket for nap time. He refused to give up any of his blankets for school. He absolutely LOVES fire trucks and all emergency responder vehicles. Saw this and knew he had to have it. Built in pillow. Washes and dries well. Folds/rolls up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard. Snip off handle!
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for a year before my four-year-old put his head through the handle and totally freaked out the people at his daycare. They sent it home - it was a trauma during naptime. Otherwise cute and I like that it matches other items he’s bringing to school, easy to keep together. Good quality has held up well. Just snip that handle off first.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: This is the second nap mat I purchased for my toddler. The first one wore out after a year. I should mention that I machine wash the mat every weekend, and my toddler used for daily basis. So I am not complaining that it wore out after a year. It is the perfect mat for daycare in term of thickness and level of comfort. The design is also smart, easy to fold up and go. The pillow can be remove for the wash. This is the most popular sleep mat in the daycare. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nap mat for my 5yr old son to take to Pre-K for nap time. He is REALLY into superhero's, and the Batman pattern is so vibrant and fun! He brings it home on the bus each Friday so we can wash it. He manages to carry it pretty easily with the handle and it has held up beautifully with the weekly wash. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old daycare sleep mat
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the sleep mat soft and thick enough not to bring extra blankets for nap time, unless she/he has the special blanket. My one year stays on it and naps well on it, the pillow that comes with it is medium firm, Rolling the blanket up the elastic actually holds it tight and firm. He’ll take this to pre-kindergarten too, it’s too long for him to outgrow it, (my 5year old still uses he’s for fun and you see him in the picture next to my one year old for example) The embroidery turned out perfect on the mat. I recommend this product, it’s $30-40 cheaper than boutiques sleep mats with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Dominique Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great little nap pad
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. My son loves the truck design and was toting it around the house to play and nap on for two weeks. Finally I had to bring it to school, but I considered buying an extra one! I removed the little pillow, washed it, and hung it to dry. It looks like it will hold up fine if washed gently. The pillow and padding are a little thin, but kids don't need much and that makes it slimmer and more portable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Use this for my little one at daycare and love it! It's been through many wash/dry cycles with ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my little one at daycare and love it! It's been through many wash/dry cycles with no issues and has a removable pillow. The blanket is good enough to keep the LO warm in the air conditioning (typical day care or home setting). The Velcro straps and nylon handle make it extremely easy to roll up/carry. The only downfall is the filling in the mat/blanket has a tendency to "bunch" up after washing; however, I fluff it like a pillow and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mhendi

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this awhile ago and I'm just now getting back to review it but my son absolutely loved it when he got it. He was so excited to take it to school! He's had it for the entire school year so far and it still looks brand new. It gets washed once a week due to nap time being after they have recess and it getting dirty and has held up greatly in the washing machine. It's been washed on delicate in cold water and hung dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Always buy this brand for sleep mats as they last forever! Take the pillow out when you wash! They may fade a bit depending on the pattern but you can wash it and it maintains the quality! Trust me some sleep mats come apart at the seams and lose it’s shape. This mat is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Barry

customer_reviews.title: best buy for your little one
customer_reviews.text: Love this nap mat!!!! My son is 4 and can easily wrap and unwrap his own mat. He loves the Dino print. Easy to carry and easy to clean. This works so much better than having to pack a pillow and blanket plus a sheet each week for school. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved! (And holds up well)
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for daycare. I wondered how my 14 month old would transition from crib to this. His teachers said he went right to sleep on it at nap time. Must be comfy! I've washed it 3 times so far and it's holding up well. Edit: 2 years later, weekly washings, and this thing is still in great shape! It’s faded, but not fraying or falling apart at all. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think a child’s blanket mat could be so scratchy and rough to the touch. I had to get fabric softener and wash it twice. I am not sure I would have purchased it if I had a chance to feel the fabric first. It’s cute and my toddler immediately took to it and layed on it but I would have chosen the microfiber option if I knew it was so stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed well but bad choice of blanket material
customer_reviews.text: Inner blanket material is like a felt material. Rough and not snuggly or sleep inducing. Other mats i’ve bought had minky on the blanket and i assumed this did too. Nope. Not a huge deal, we kept it but he used an additional blanket. Pillow is great and removable
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth trying to decide if I wanted to spend the extra money on this for kindergarten. (I didn’t know if it was really worth it) but I’m so thankful I did! My son loves it, his teacher loves it and it’s super easy to wash. It was definitely worth the extra money. The quality was also great held up really well over the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with nice materials but could be longer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product built out of high quality fabric and stitch but the overall length of this bag is too small for the ages from 3-7 like it claims to be. Our son is a below average height kid who hasn't turned 5 yet and he barely makes it into this sleeping bag. I am seriously considering returning this product as it doesn't suit my needs for the next 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: Quality not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m a mom of a toddler boy who goes to the daycare so I thought I should invest in a high quality sleeping bag. I brought the wildkin sleeping bag less than 2 months ago thinking it durable and good quality like it Company promised. But instead the quality of the sleeping bag is poorly and not durable. The fabric is ripped already and paid $45 for his sleeping bag. I don’t think the quality is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Phale

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this brand for years and love it! Great quality and super comfortable for our toddler to use at school.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: I run an in-home daycare and these are perfect for my 2 to 4 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I run an in-home daycare and these are perfect for my 2 to 4 year olds. The size is just right and the thickness of the blanket is great for year round. The pad is just the right thickness for sleepinf on carpet. My daycare is carpeted. you would need an additional nap mat if you are placing the child on a hard floor such as industrial carpet or hardwood floor. The kids love rolling up and putting their nap mats away. Really easy to clean. I love the all-in-one nap mat because I dont have to deal with seperate nap mat slip covers, pillows, pillow cases, nap mats and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Talya Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this for pre school. We wash it in cold water every couple weeks and hang to dry and it’s held up great! We have another one as well and this one is a lot thicker and seems to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sandpaper after washing
customer_reviews.text: While I loved this nap mat in the beginning, it slowly began to lose life. After one wash it started to feel like sandpaper, and we all know how often things like this need to be washed. So the more it was washed the worse it got. Now it’s too rough for my baby to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Strickland

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR A CHRISTMAS GIFT AND I WAS GOING TO PERSONALIZE IT ON THE SOLID BLUE PIECE OF FABRIC WITH MY NEPHEW'S NAME. AND GUESS WHAT IT IS NOT A SOLID BLUE PIECE IT IS THE SAME PATTERN OF THE SLEEPING BAG, SO A NAME WONT EVEN BE NOTICABLE. ITS GOING BACK FOR THAT REASON.
customer_reviews.author: AJMPHX

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love this nap mat. More importantly my toddler loves it. I bought this when he moved from crib to a floor mat and he loves it because it’s so cozy. It’s much fluffier than many others I’ve seen. It’s easy to wash in the washing machine. The only thing I don’t like about it is that there’s nothing to cover the Velcro straps while it’s being washed.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Itchy material
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars because of the material. Says cotton and polyester blend, but it is extremely itchy and seems stiff even after washing and drying it. I'm hoping that it gets softer once he uses it now. My 2 year old seems to not mind it. But I expected more softness. Cute design and I love how you can remove the pillow before washing.
customer_reviews.author: Rtw5166

customer_reviews.title: Velcro needs adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute mat. A littlest pricey for the quality, but it will do for my daughther’s rest time at school. The Velcro needs to be adjusted. We aren’t able to roll the mat up as tight as I would like (especially for classroom storage). I hope it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the robot mat for my one year old about to start preschool. It came in yesterday, I washed it just as directed and when I pulled it out to let it air dry, it looked awful! It looks so worn, almost faded; and has those little balls all over it. I’m so disappointed. This brand came highly recommended and I was planning on ordering matching accessories but now I won’t be
customer_reviews.author: WhitLadDav

customer_reviews.title: It will work
customer_reviews.text: Nice but not as nice as the Hi Sprouts one that I ordered. It is a little too stiff for my liking and when you roll it up for storage, the velcro straps almost go past the strips they stick to. I have to loosely roll it up so they will come closer to lining up. It is cheaper than the Hi Sprouts one that i like much better but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: maui00

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old uses this at his preschool, i bought it during summer and even though it might be thicker it was perfect because they tend to blast the ac in the classroom during nap time, so he was very comfy and warm during his nap. Folding it is simple and so is washing it. After the first wash, theres little cotton balls all around it, thats the only downside. But thick and good quality. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MSan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pre-School Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: Adorable dinosaur print, easy to roll up, and it has made it through the first month of pre-school intact. No data yet on how well it stands up to laundering. I'm looking for fabric which is fade-resistant and does not PILL.
customer_reviews.author: Blindsided

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Preschool
customer_reviews.text: After making a nap mat for my first and spending close to $70 on materials and 8 hours cutting and sewing I was happy to order this one. A little smaller than the one I made, probably wouldn’t work for a taller kiddo and I would say pre-k is the max for this, but great quality and easy to roll up and use.
customer_reviews.author: climbinash

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old LOVES his mat. We bought it for rest time at preschool. He has plenty of room and isn’t too tall for it. It actually has some cushion to it and the pillow has a perfect amount of stuffing. I haven’t washed it yet, so I can’t attest to how well it holds up, but it is just darling. I added his name with iron on vinyl with my Cricut and the heat from the iron didn’t affect the stuffing at all.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom36

customer_reviews.title: Requires stitch removal for embroidery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to embroider my sons name for school but the part to put the name is stitched on 3 sides. Since I’m not a sewer, I now can’t embroider it. Otherwise quality and comfort is great. The blanket is the perfect size since it’s larger. I just wish the part for the name was only stitched on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved this napper when it arrived; it was very soft, vibrant in color, and looked to be a of a nice quality. After initially washing it (following the cool water, air dry instructions) I noticed a few areas of piling, but didn’t think too much of it. After another wash, again following the instructions, the whole napper was completely piled and it looked like my son had had it for a year, not a few days. I am so disappointed; I contacted the company but received no response. I wish this mat had lived up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Will J

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, easy to pack up and so easy to open my 2-yo can do it himself. The only thing I will say is the manufacturer doesn't recommended machine wash, but who has time to hand wash? So we tuck the velcro the best we can and put it in a mesh bag to prevent it getting caught in the agitator. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this little nap mat. Its sturdy, soft but doesnt seem flimsy, rolls up easily, fits my 2.5 yr old with room to grow and the blanket covers his whole self and then some which he likes. My only issue is the napmat came with this slice right down it. Looks like maybe from a box cutter or something real sharp and thin. Oddly the plastic packaging was in tact and had no damage to that. I would send it back but I'm stuck in that my son started preschool this week and needs to bring it to school. I'm sure once we wash it it will probably start unraveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: feet stick out at bottom, great mat though
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat is so cute and well made. If I were to buy again I would choose a nap mat with the blanket sewn at the bottom instead of the side. My son is a little tall and his feet stick out at the bottom. Other than that my son loves the trucks and its a great nap mat.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in MS

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color, not very soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cute unicorn pattern, and recieved a very disappointing grey car pattern. Luckily my daughter seems to be ok with it. The one she was borrowing at school is all soft, but this one is rough and scratchy. I'm hoping it will soften over time through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Large But Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality nap mat. Great material and has a great thickness. Minus one star because of how big it is. My son's preschool puts the nap mat on raised cots and this one always hangs off over the edges compared to other students nap mats. This one is also very slippery. We had to sew in elastic bands on all 4 corners so we could get it to wrap around the cot and stay put. Otherwise, this is a great nap mat!
customer_reviews.author: Janellemp

customer_reviews.title: it's very comfortable and the size is great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 4 year old to take to preK with her. She loves it, it's very comfortable and the size is great. I looked for a week before I ordered this one, most of the others were much smaller. Her Teachers ask me where I purchased this because they love it as well and want to order the same one for their kids. I highly recommend this product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: So great we bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this mat! Bought one for home because the one I bought for my son to use at preschool was a huge hit! Easy to clean, simply remove pillow insert and throw directly in washing machine. I have cleaned both several times, no fading or pilling to speak of.
customer_reviews.author: kinena

customer_reviews.title: Or toddler is a big fan!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little higher quality, or softer fabric, but my son LOVES IT. We got the robot one, and he asks for his "bots" every time we take him to our friends house for a sleep over. He loves that it has a pillow and a blanket all in one. I do have to put a pad underneath it, though, since there isn't much padding on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great nap mat for the price! And you can tell it's popular, because there are 10 other of the same kind in my son's preschool program! The mat isn't super padded, but it's comfortable enough (better on a carpet floor than on a tile floor). Easy to wash (pillow is removable), and has been holding up great for the past two months. I only wish that there was an easy way to have a removable name label. I've seen some people write with sharpee, but I'd like to reuse it with another kid and had to write his name on the care label.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S

customer_reviews.title: Love love love !!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son since he will need for school. It is perfect love everything about it and more importantly he loved it. The quality is great is supper soft and easy to roll by himself. The price is so much better here than the actual company you can’t beat that. The colors are very bright
customer_reviews.author: Theisel

customer_reviews.title: Use them all the time for school & travel
customer_reviews.text: Great nap mat with a good-sized, fleece lined blanket and good cushioning for those hard preschool floors. They have also been great for travel. We packed them in with the car seats and kids camped out great on the floor of our room. Durable - wears well after many washings. I throw it in the wash with their clothes, tumble dry low and they've both held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it and my son does too as he's a huge fan of emergency vehicles. It's pretty good quality. The blanket is attached to the left side of the sleeping bag, so it flips from one side only, which is fine. Underneath the blanket is a soft fleece. The rest is not as soft but soft enough .
customer_reviews.author: eid8801

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare a bit thin
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than I expected not enough for sleeping at night but good enough for daycare that’s always warm. One impetus suggest is having tabs of some sort to cover the scratchy Velcro side when unrolled... it attaches to carpet and rugs carpet fibers up but this bag isn’t thick enough for hardwood
customer_reviews.author: S glass

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for two years and it gets a lot of use. Great to bring along when traveling so little one always has a bed. Even in hotel rooms or visiting family we put on the carpet and little one sleeps very good on it. So no worries about falling off a tall bed or requesting a child bed. We even use it at home very often. It washes well and hasn’t lost any color.
customer_reviews.author: leilei

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad i got this sleeper. I got it for my son for PreK3 and he loves it. I must admit, it's a cool looking sleeper. Other than the looks of it, it's has a soft inside cover and it's super easy to handle. It's worth it, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sea of cheap nap mats, comes this perfect, dependable and cuddly sleeping bag. Bought this for daycare and my kid loves it! I’ve seen some of the cheaper version sleep mats at daycare and they look sad and uncomfortable. This does the job and is easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: jessica a bois

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. The only reason it is not 5 stars is that the thickness stated is deceiving. It is more like an open sleeping bag with a pillow attached.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Weihert

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the thickness
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the thickness, did not seem to be 2 inches. I have a Olive Kid Sleeping bag for my oldest and it felt more padded closed then the mat did even with the attached blanket. Ordered the matching sleeping bag and returned. Return was fast & easy. Appreciate the seller for that. TIP: Go with the sleeping bag over the mat but ** stitch to avoid bunching after the weekly daycare washes ***. I found a single stitch every 5 inches worked great and it has held the sleeping bag stuffing in place 2 years and still going... and I totally had no idea how to sew.
customer_reviews.author: Alias4Me

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new sleep mat but the material leaves much to be desired. While I understand the need for durability it is very rough fabric and feels very scratchy. Cleaning it is fairly painless but you have to pick all of the lint out of the velcro so it doesn't stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wildkin Original Nap Mat with Pillow for Toddler Boys and Girls, Ideal for Daycare and Preschool, Measures 50 x 1.5 x 20 Inches, Mom's Choice Award Winner, BPA-Free, Olive Kids (Out of this World)
product_meta.description: Color:Out of this WorldDrifting off to sleep during nap time is a breeze when your child is snuggled up in Wildkin’s Original Nap Mat. Each Nap Mat measures 50 x 1.5 x 20 inches and is perfectly sized for keeping your little one cozy. Wildkin’s Original Nap Mat is made from a super soft blend of cotton and polyester materials. The attached blanket is lined with 100% cotton flannel to keep your little one extra warm. Each Nap Mat features a roll-up design, complete with elastic hook and loop fastening straps and a convenient carrying handle. Its travel-friendly design makes it easy for your little one to take their Nap Mat to-and-from school, sleepovers, and more. Each Original Nap Mat was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin gear. From lunch boxes, to duffel bags, to backpacks, your child will love having their favorite designs with them on-the-go. Remove pillow before washing. Wash in commercial front-loading machine in cold water on gentle cycle. Hang to dry. Do not store unless dry. Spot clean pillow only. Do not store pillow or put pillow into nap mat sleeve unless dry. 90-day manufacturer's warranty against defects - normal wear-and-tear, and misuse excluded. Rigorously tested to ensure that all parts are lead-safe, bpa-free, phthalate-free, and conform to all rules and regulations set forth by the Consumer Products Safety Commission. Not intended for outdoor use.
feature_bullets: SNOOZE HAPPY - Drifting off to sleep during nap time is a breeze when your child is snuggled up in Wildkin's Original Nap Mat for toddlers boys and girls. Each Nap Mat measures 50 x 1.5 x 20 inches and is perfectly sized for keeping your little one cozy. Between its eye-catching patterns and super comfy design, your little one won't want to sleep without their new favorite sleep mat or nap mats. This can also be used in school as daycare nap mat.

SUPER SOFT - Wildkin's Original Kids Nap Mat is made from a super soft blend of cotton and polyester materials. The attached blanket is lined with 100% cotton flannel to keep your little one extra warm. Whether they're cuddled up on their cot for a happy napper snooze or hunkered down in the living room for a blanket-fort campout. This Nap Mat is sure to keep your child ultra-comfy a perfect kids nap mat with pillow and blanket.

MOM’S CHOICE AWARDEE - Wildkin is a recipient of the prestigious Mom’s Choice Award. The MCA evaluates products created for parents and is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly products. Using a rigorous evaluation process, we are scored on quality, design, educational value, originality, appeal & cost. Around the world, parents, educators, & retailers trust the MCA Excellence seal when selecting quality products/services for families and children.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY DESIGN - Naptime can happen anywhere with Wildkin's Original Kids Sleeping Mat or Nap Mat! Each toddlers, boys and girls nap mat features a roll-up design, complete with elastic hook and loop fastening straps and a convenient carrying handle. Its travel-friendly design makes it easy for your little one to take their Nap Mat to-and-from school, sleepovers and more.

VIBRANT COLORS THAT LAST - Accidents happen, which is why we made our Original Nap Mat easy to clean so your child can get back to snoozing! Just remove the included pillow and place your Nap Mat in a front-loading washer in cold water on a gentle cycle and hang to dry. Our vibrant colors were made to last, so you don't have to worry that they'll fade after washing.

PATTERN COORDINATES WITH OTHER WILDKIN AND OLIVE KIDS ITEMS - Make a theme out of it! Each Original Nap Mat sheet was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin gear and Olive Kids items. From lunch boxes, to duffel bags, to backpacks, your child will love having their favorite designs with them on-the-go specially when use as napping mat anywhere and on travel naptime mat.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,212 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
